apt_description: PROMETHIUM is an activity group that has been active since at least 2012. The group conducted a campaign in May 2016 and has heavily targeted Turkish victims. PROMETHIUM has demonstrated similarity to another activity group called NEODYMIUM due to overlapping victim and campaign characteristics. [1] [2]

software_item.software_description: Boot or Logon Autostart Execution: Registry Run Keys / Startup Folder, Masquerading: Masquerade Task or Service
